<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H8033|שָׁם]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּמָּה‎</span> **adverb** ==there== (so Egyptian Aramaic (RÉS<sup>361 B 5</sup> [also <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תנה‎</span><sup>A 4</sup>, so Cilician Aramaic, [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>68. 5</sup>, compare Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תנן‎</span> ib.<sup>121. 3</sup>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">] [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>A 4, J 6</sup>); [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תַּמָּן‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, see Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שָׁם‎</span>); — [[Ezra.5.17|Ezra 5:17]]; [[Ezra.6.1|Ezra 6:1]]; [[Ezra.6.12|Ezra 6:12]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מִןתֿ‎</span> ***thence*** [[Ezra.6.6|Ezra 6:6]].
